pullrequest.title: per issue #194, alternative solution, add ROS service, allowing user to change joint damping with hard coded per joint bounds

content.raw: In c3ca80488b3a, I added the new services to the rosapi yaml files.  That'll become relevant when pull request #257 lands.  One of the two merges will have conflicts, but it should be easy to resolve by taking the union of the two APIs.
content.html: In c3ca80488b3a, I added the new services to the rosapi yaml files. That'll become relevant when pull request #257 lands. One of the two merges will have conflicts, but it should be easy to resolve by taking the union of the two APIs.
